page.title: 02TRAFFIC SURVEY RESULTS
page.content: We conducted our traffic survey on Friday 14th June 1985 .From 2.25pm_3.05pm. The weather was fine.Seven people were placed at several survey points,four at the main crossroads in {Woodbury}and three at the junction of {B3180}and{B3179 .} Of all the vehicles recorded 84% were private cars,7% were light vans,7% were motor cycles,6% were commercial vehicles,1% were tractors,1% were bicycles. Of private cars 53% carried one person,30% carried two people,11% carried three people,3% carried four people,2% carried five people,1% carried six people. Most vehicles recorded were between two and four years old.
